title: Tell Your Story
subtitle: Share the emotional journey behind your jewelry

voiceRecorder.title: Voice Recording
voiceRecorder.notSupported: Voice recording is not supported in this browser. Please use a modern browser with microphone support.
voiceRecorder.permissionDenied: Microphone access denied. Please allow microphone access and try again.

transcription.title: Speech Transcription
transcription.notSupported: Speech recognition is not supported in this browser. You can still edit the transcript manually.
transcription.placeholder: The transcribed text will appear here...
transcription.editTip: Click edit to modify the transcript
transcription.startTip: Start speaking or upload audio to begin

speechToText.title: Speech to Text
speechToText.notSupported: Speech recognition is not supported in this browser. You can still edit the transcript manually.
speechToText.permissionDenied: Microphone access was denied for speech recognition.
speechToText.noSpeechDetected: No speech detected. Please try again.
speechToText.networkError: A network error occurred during transcription.
speechToText.languageNotSupported: The selected language is not supported for speech recognition.

voiceToText.title: Voice to Text Story Input
voiceToText.settingsDesc: Advanced settings for voice recording and transcription will be available here.

textStoryInput.title: Write Your Story
textStoryInput.label: Your Story
textStoryInput.placeholder: Share the story behind your jewelry...
textStoryInput.tooShort: Story must be at least {{minLength}} characters long

placeholders.textInput: Share the story behind your jewelry...

validation.title: Validation Status
validation.contentTooShort: Story must be at least {{min}} characters long
validation.emotionTagsRecommended: Adding emotion tags helps jewelers understand your vision
validation.budgetRangeRecommended: Budget range helps match you with appropriate jewelers

metadata.titleLabel: Give your story a meaningful title
metadata.titlePlaceholder: e.g., A Mother's Love Ring, Wedding Band of Dreams
metadata.titleHelper: Choose a title that captures the essence of your story
metadata.emotionHelper: Select the emotions that best describe your story and desired jewelry
metadata.styleHelper: Choose styles that appeal to you for your custom jewelry piece
metadata.budgetLabel: What is your budget for this piece?
metadata.budgetHelper: This helps us match you with appropriate jewelers
metadata.timelineLabel: When do you need this completed?
metadata.timelineHelper: Let us know your preferred completion timeframe
metadata.culturalLabel: Does this piece have special cultural or religious meaning?
metadata.culturalPlaceholder: Describe any cultural traditions, religious significance, or family customs...
metadata.culturalHelper: Help jewelers understand the cultural context
metadata.notesLabel: Any special requests or additional details?
metadata.notesPlaceholder: Specific materials, techniques, sizing details, allergies, etc...
metadata.notesHelper: Share any specific requirements or preferences

success.title: Story Submitted Successfully!
success.message: Your story has been submitted and will be reviewed by our jeweler network.

storyPreview.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support the audio element.
storyPreview.jewelryOpportunityDesc: This story presents a wonderful opportunity to create meaningful, custom jewelry.
